text: Ðis syndon ðære healfan hide landgemæro æt Lytlanhamme.
Ðonne up on stryem, be norðan Lydewicnæsse on ðone norðran mere.
Up andlang riðan of ðone æwylm.
Andlang ðæs hricgweges on ða ealdan dic.
East andlang ðære dic of ðære wega gelæto be norðan ðam fulan lande.
Ðanon norð on ðone grenan weg on auan ford.
Of ðam fordan up andlang stryemes on ðone sele.
Of ðam sele norð on ðone grenan weg to ðam slæde.
East up andlang ðæs slædes to ðære pleginstowe.
Andlang ðæs herpaðes to fugelis beorhdune.
Andlang ðære dune to fuhgeles beorhge.
Fram ðam beorhge suð to ellewurðie.
Adun ðonne andlang ðæs broces eft ut on sæ.
Ðis is ðære healfan hyde landboc æt Littlanhamme ðe Eadweard kyng let gebocygean Ordgare his þegne on ece yrfe.
